title: The Last Broken Piece
description: Check your basement, lock your doors, and be watchful of your surroundings, as a new killer has emerged in the city of Cornwall. Children show up in emergency centres without a hair out of place, but the parents are dead, and detectives are being taunted.Detective Arthur Young is in charge of the investigation. With chaos surrounding him, will he be able to solve the case and keep his life afloat, or will this be the one that consumes him?Â Stella Morris sees a vision of her future with Detective Nick Lowell, one where she finally gets the happily ever after she deserves. But can she conceal her homicidal secrets from his curious, inquiring mind, or will she pay the ultimate price?
author: Tanya  Lynn
